channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: The Astronomer (Vermeer)
item.description: The Astronomer (Dutch: De astronoom) is a painting finished in about 1668 by the Dutch Golden Age painter Johannes Vermeer. It is in oil on canvas with dimensions 51 cm × 45 cm (20 in × 18 in).
